data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Campeche, Mexico with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Campeche, Mexico
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Campeche, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.section_summary: On average, 43 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Campeche, Mexico.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Father, we cry out for a prayer movement in the state of Campeche, Mexico. Please, stir the 77,953 believers here to pray for awakening.
Father, show your mercy on the 665,947 people in Campeche who are far from you. Please add 148 new house churches this year.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Japanese people might believe through him.
Spirit, guide seekers in Campeche, Mexico to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Campeche. Through your servants plant 148 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Campeche, Mexico.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
